description.raw:
The `send_flags` command was introduced in zqmcpp in version 4.4.0 . Fixing the problems generated by [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/438/zmq-warnings/diff](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/438/zmq-warnings/diff) .

Tested:

* windows.win32 \(version 4.3.0\)

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=965)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_transport-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/965/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/965/))


* windows\_nuc.win10 \(version 4.6.0\)

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=964)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_transport-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/964/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/964/)) 



‌

title: Fix version for send_flags command

summary.raw:
The `send_flags` command was introduced in zqmcpp in version 4.4.0 . Fixing the problems generated by [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/438/zmq-warnings/diff](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/438/zmq-warnings/diff) .

Tested:

* windows.win32 \(version 4.3.0\)

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=965)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_transport-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/965/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/965/))
